text: dhiluk bi'ana allah hu al'ilh alhaqu aldhy la tunbighi aleibadat 'iilaa laha, wa'ana ma yaebuduh almushrikun min dunih min al'asnam wal'andad hu albatil aldhy la yanfae wala ydrru, wa'ana allah hu alely ealaa khalaqah dhatana wqdrana wqhrana, almutaeali ean al'ashbah wal'andadi, alkabir fi dhatih wa'asmayih fahu akbr mn kll shaya'a
